DOC.brief_summary: The LMA Supreme ( SLMA ) single-use supraglottic device provide good seal positive pressure ventilation good first attempt insertion rate 98 % low-risk patient undergoing Caesarean section . It double aperture design facilitate introduction orogastric tube aspirate gastric content . The current practice use endotracheal intubation rapid sequence induction general anaesthesia Caesarean section . The primary study hypothesis first attempt insertion success rate SLMA endotracheal intubation equivalent difference le 3 % .
DOC.brief_title: Supreme LMA Endotracheal Intubation Use Caesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: We propose randomise control trial study first attempt insertion success rate supreme LMA versus endotracheal intubation general anaesthesia elective Caesarean section .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 50 year old ASA 1 2 Fasted least 6 hour Weight 40 75kg Normal airway assessment Singleton term pregnancy ( > 36weeks ) Elective Caesarean section In labour Body mass index > 35 Difficult airway ( Mallampati 4 abnormal airway assessment ) Gastrooesophageal reflux disease
